metadata.name: Job Description
metadata.value:
Job Description – Partner Account Manager for Geo Expansion in 12 Cities (Emerging Territory Sales) on PAN India basis -with Partners for commercial mid-range acceleration 

1.	The person will be responsible for geographical expansion in the upcountry market. 
2.	The upcountry market is defined as the market beyond large cities (Delhi, Noida and Gurgaon, Mumbai, Chennai, Bangalore)
3.	The person will be required to work with the partner ecosystem of reseller, VADs and alliances to grow the business in new and emerging territories.

4.	The person will be responsible for meeting the requisite goals set forth in terms of revenue, partner recruitment and new cities billed and enabled.
 
5.	The person should possess skills to work in a virtual team environment. The team will include the ISR, Technical sales, Marketing etc. 

6.	The ideal person for the role would be a “workpreneur” meaning self-driven to plan and execute as per the strategic vision of the organization. 

7.	The ideal candidate should have experience of working in similar roles in a high-tech industry or complex sales environment. 

8.	The ideal candidate should have the experience of working with senior management of the partner organization and customer organization. 

9.	The ideal candidate will have an analytical bent of mind to assess the situation on the ground and be quick in decision making. 

10.	The candidate should be willing to travel at least 65% of the time.  

11.	The candidate should be prompt in reporting and forecasting. 
Experience: 12-15 years of experience.

title: Partner Account Manager -Geo Expansion with Partners PAN India
content:
We’re Hitachi Vantara, a global infrastructure business. Our people are the force of meaningful progress. We enable the incredible with data – from taking theme park fans on magical rides, conserving natural resources, protecting rainforests to saving lives. We empower businesses to automate, optimize and advance innovation. Together, we create a sustainable future for all. 
Imagine the sheer breadth of talent it takes to inspire he future. We don’t expect you to ‘fit’ every requirement – your life experience, character, perspective, and passion for achieving great things in the world are equally important to us.The Role
Partner Account Manager for Geo Expansion in 12 Cities (Emerging Territory Sales) on PAN India basis -with Partners for commercial mid-range acceleration 
1.    The person will be responsible for geographical expansion in the upcountry market. 2.    The upcountry market is defined as the market beyond large cities (Delhi, Noida and Gurgaon, Mumbai, Chennai, Bangalore)3.    The person will be required to work with the partner ecosystem of reseller, VADs and alliances to grow the business in new and emerging territories.
4.    The person will be responsible for meeting the requisite goals set forth in terms of revenue, partner recruitment and new cities billed and enabled. 5.    The person should possess skills to work in a virtual team environment. The team will include the ISR, Technical sales, Marketing etc. 
6.    The ideal person for the role would be a “workpreneur” meaning self-driven to plan and execute as per the strategic vision of the organization. 
7.    The ideal candidate should have experience of working in similar roles in a high-tech industry or complex sales environment. 
8.    The ideal candidate should have the experience of working with senior management of the partner organization and customer organization. 
9.    The ideal candidate will have an analytical bent of mind to assess the situation on the ground and be quick in decision making. 
10.    The candidate should be willing to travel at least 65% of the time.  
11.    The candidate should be prompt in reporting and forecasting. 
Experience: 12-15 years of experience.Championing diversity, equity, and inclusion 
Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We support your uniqueness and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our team.
How we look after you
We want to help you take care of your today and tomorrow – at home and at work. Which is why we offer industry-leading benefits that go far beyond compensation. That means support, services, and resources that also take care of your holistic health and wellbeing. We’re always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. Here, you’ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with. We’re also champions of life balance and offer flexible arrangements that work for you (role and location dependent).
About us
We’re a global team of innovators. Together, we harness engineering excellence and passion for insight to co-create meaningful solutions to complex challenges. We turn organizations into data-driven leaders that can a make positive impact on their industries and society. If you believe that innovation can inspire the future, this is the place to fulfil your purpose and achieve your potential.
We’re proud to say we’re an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, age, disability status or any other protected characteristic. Should you need reasonable accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know so that we can do our best to set you up for success.

demographic_questions.description:
At Hitachi Vantara, we value the diversity of our workforce and strive to foster an inclusive environment in which talent from all backgrounds can thrive, bringing their unique contributions to our culture and success. We are an equal opportunity employer and seek to strengthen our hiring practices by identifying and mitigating the potential for bias in our assessment and selection processes.

Below is a set of voluntary demographic questions that, if you choose to complete, will provide aggregated data to inform our hiring strategy and help us uphold our commitment to inclusive hiring.  Your responses, or choice to not respond, will in no way be linked to your specific application and will not be used to inform the hiring decision.

Our company does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression or veteran status. In order to track the effectiveness of our recruiting efforts and ensure we consider the needs of all our employees, please consider the following optional questions.

questions.label: Which age group describes you?
Which category best describes you?

answer_options.label: South Asian (For example, Bangladeshi, Bhutanese, Indian)
East Asian (For example - Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Filipino, Indonesian, Vietnamese)
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

questions.label: Would you describe yourself as having a physical impairment or disability?
Do you consider yourself a member of the LGBTQIA+ community?
How do you currently describe your gender identity?
Do you identify as transgender?
First Name
Last Name
Email
Phone
Resume/CV
Cover Letter
Current Address (Street Address, City, State, Country, Zip Code)
LinkedIn Profile
Are you legally authorized to work in the country where this job is located?
Will you now, or in the future, require sponsorship for employment?

Are you a citizen from one of the countries listed here?
(Needed to determine if export authorization is required).
If yes, do you have dual citizenship (i.e., a citizen of another country) or legal permanent residency in another country?
If yes, please list such country(ies) below. If no, respond "no"

questions.description:
Please click HERE to read the Hitachi Vantara Data Protection Privacy Statement. 

By checking the box labeled “I Consent” on this submission page and submitting my personal data to the Company, I confirm that I have read, understand, and consent to the terms and conditions, including those which are provided via hyperlinks on this page, in which my personal data will be processed by the Company.
questions.label: Data Protection Notification and Consent Form*

Do you currently, or have you ever worked for any company within the Hitachi Group? 
E.g., Hitachi Rail, Hitachi Energy etc.
If yes, please specify the Hitachi company name. If no, respond "no"
